attributes.action: allow cities and towns to host their own remembrance for the 25th anniversary of the Falklands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the government has declared that the only remembrance service for the Falklands will be held in London, I would like towns to be able to host their own services to give the people who were in the war the chance to remember it in the towns from which they were based.
